forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally cloudy. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 12C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
